attributes.action: Ensure that ALL Covid restrictions are lifted on June 21st 2021
attributes.additional_details: We call on the Government to lift ALL restrictions and return us to the normal we had before the pandemic, not any so-called, 'new normal'. We are told that the vaccination programme is working and that cases and deaths are falling, so there should be no reason for any restriction to remain in place beyond that date. The Government must restore public faith by lifting all restrictions on 21 June.
attributes.background: The Government's roadmap out of the current lockdown raised expectations that on June 21st 2021, all Covid restrictions would finally be lifted and yet already there are suggestions that some restrictions may stay in place long after that date. This is NOT acceptable.
